issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: MobileWeb: Tabbed Application and Single Window Application crash

comments.body:
It turns out something broken on Mobile Web. Chris is looking into that.
Sent PR just for cleaning up the template and fixing comments. Those PRs are also a workaround of this crash.
https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/Template.Tabbed/pull/5
https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/Template.SingleWindow/pull/1
Closing ticket due to MobileWeb no longer being supported.
